mapper.insert: insert into book_info (book_id, book_category_id, `name`, outline, detail, press, publish_date, `size`, version, author, translator, isbn, price, pages, `catalog`, market_price, member_price, deal_mount, look_mount, discount, image_url, store_mount, store_time, pack_style, is_shelf) values (#{bookId}, #{bookCategoryId}, #{name}, #{outline}, #{detail}, #{press}, #{publishDate}, #{size}, #{version}, #{author}, #{translator}, #{isbn}, #{price}, #{pages}, #{catalog}, #{marketPrice}, #{memberPrice}, #{dealMount}, #{lookMount}, #{discount}, #{imageUrl}, #{storeMount}, #{storeTime}, #{packStyle}, #{isShelf})
mapper.select: select book_id, book_category_id, `name`, outline, detail, press, publish_date, `size`, version, author, translator, isbn, price, pages, `catalog`, market_price, member_price, deal_mount, look_mount, discount, image_url, store_mount, store_time, pack_style, is_shelf from book_info where book_id = #{bookId}
